price: 35. Zij zullen daar geen nutteloos gepraat horen, noch een leugen.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
